thread.title: Simon Canty
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Simon Canty

author: Simon Canty
title: Simon Canty
text:
My service and MOT was due for renewal.
I found 'Servicing Stop' online along with a few other similar options.
Their prices seemed very competitive, along with a free collect and drop off so I decided to give them a go.
I booked it all online and no payment needed.
I was texted and emailed with the Quote: and later reminders for when the car will be collected.
My car was collected earlier than expected that morning, but that was a bonus for me.
Once the service and MOT was complete I was called by David who was clear, courteous, knowledgeable and not a pushy salesman.
He recommended that some items would need to be addressed in the near future such as tyres and brakes and provided me with the details of the wear on the items and the costs of the parts and labour to replace them.
After some consideration I declined the work which David was fine with.
He then sent me a link to pay for the service and MOT, which was the exact amount I was originally Quote: d (plus a small charge for using my debit card).
Later that afternoon my car was back along with a list of the work done, a new MOT and service book stamped.
Plus I didn't have to leave the house.
Happy days!
I would be very happy to use Servicing Stop again and my wife will be using it for the next service on her car.
